text: Valentina Tronel (born 6 April 2009), better known as simply Valentina, is the winner of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2020. In 2016, she took part in the French version of The Voice Kids. Since 2018, she has been part of the group Kids United. She represented France in the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2020 with the song "J'imagine". == Discography == === Singles === Year Title Album 2020 "J'imagine" Plus loin qu'un rêve 2021 "Y'a pas que les grands qui rêvent" 2021 "Je chante" ==References== Category:2009 births Category:Living people Category:Child singers Category:French singers Category:People from Rennes
title: Valentina Tronel
